name: tm34
effect: Teaches Shock Wave to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sludge Wave to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Shock Wave Gen II: Swagger Gen I: Bide)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Zaps the foe with a jolt of electricity that never misses.
flavor_text.emerald: Zaps the foe with a jolt of electricity that never misses.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A rapid jolt of electricity strikes the foe. It can’t be evaded.
